ITCS4120::OpenGLTrainer::ExperimentControl

ITCS4120::OpenGLTrainer::ExperimentControl Struct Reference

'ExperimentControl' enables/disables calling of various GL functions for purposes of experimenting and learning their effects. More...

Detailed Description

'ExperimentControl' enables/disables calling of various GL functions for purposes of experimenting and learning their effects.

Member Data Documentation

bool ITCS4120::OpenGLTrainer::ExperimentControl::traceDisplay

enable/disable message when calling display callback

enable/disable message when calling idle callback

enable/disable skiping all drawing in display callback

enable/disable glutSwapBuffer at end of display callback

bool ITCS4120::OpenGLTrainer::ExperimentControl::clear

enable/disable clearing framebuffer at start of display callback
